mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu(parent_id, name, path, icon, sort, hidden, type, permlabel, module_key) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{name}, #{path}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{hidden}, #{type}, #{permlabel}, #{moduleKey})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, path = #{path}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, hidden = #{hidden}, type = #{type}, permlabel = #{permlabel}, module_key = #{moduleKey} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{menu.parentId}, name = #{menu.name}, path = #{menu.path}, icon = #{menu.icon}, sort = #{menu.sort}, hidden = #{menu.hidden}, type = #{menu.type}, permlabel = #{menu.permlabel}, module_key = #{menu.moduleKey} WHERE id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY m.parent_id ASC, m.sort ASC, m.id ASC

SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.username = #{username} INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE rm.menu_id = m.id AND (m.hidden IS NULL OR m.hidden = 0) ORDER BY m.parent_id ASC, m.sort ASC, m.id ASC
